name: Gulam
description:
A very short visual novel made for Nanoreno 2017. Multiple playthroughs are encouraged.

Credits

  • Story, art, writing, scripting - Aracade (aracadearacade@gmail.com)
  • Music - Purple planet, presence of music
  • Sfx - MySoundEffect, FreeSound
  • Made with Ren'py

If you have any thoughts you'd like to share about the game just drop a comment below or you could comment at the Lemmasoft forum thread. :)

Updates

3/4/2017

  • New ending
  • Typo/Bug fixes
